actions-list.actionItem: The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Chaplain Paul Anderson, Adventist Chaplaincy Ministries, Columbia, MD
The Speaker designated the Honorable Alexander X. Mooney to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
